docs.lead_paragraph: When I was pregnant with my first child, I kept it a secret from everyone at work for the first three months. That was logistically simple -- I was working in the Houston bureau of The Times at the time, and my editors and colleagues were almost all in New York. But it was physically and emotionally exhausting. I was spending as much energy pretending I wasn't pregnant as I was actually being pregnant, which adds up to an awful lot of energy.

headline.main: When to Tell the Boss You're Pregnant

docs.abstract: Bosses, employees, veteran's of the break-the-news conversation - what advice do you have?
docs.snippet: Bosses, employees, veteran's of the break-the-news conversation - what advice do you have?

docs.lead_paragraph: Notes from the newsroom on grammar, usage and style.
docs.abstract: We've suffered another outbreak of dangling participles and other misconnected modifiers.Be alert whenever a participle construction or other modifying phrase comes at the start of a sentence. In general, the noun or pronoun being described should follow that phrase directly.

docs.lead_paragraph: 9 P.M. (13) THE DANCING BOYS OF AFGHANISTAN They call it Bacha Bazi, or ''boy play'': an ancient tradition, banned when the Taliban were in power, in which street orphans or sons from poor families are bought by businessmen. The boys, sometimes dressed in women's clothes, are taught to sing and dance for the entertainment of male audiences, above -- and then traded or sold among the men for sex. The result can be murder, and even the Afghan authorities responsible for stopping these crimes have been accused of participation. Drawing on interviews with boys, their families and their masters, Najibullah Quraishi exposes this practice, prohibited by Afghan law, for ''Frontline.'' 4 P.M. (ABC); 7 P.M. (55) THE OPRAH WINFREY SHOW Cameras follow 24 hours in the life of Nadya Suleman, a k a Octomom.

docs.lead_paragraph: BEIJING (AP) -- A Chinese court jailed three people on Friday who posted material on the Internet to help an illiterate woman pressure the authorities to reinvestigate her daughter's death, a defendant's lawyer said.
docs.abstract: Chinese court in Fuzhou sentences three people to terms of one to two years in jail for posting material on Internet to help woman pressure authorities to re-investigate her daughter's death; police had ruled that woman had died of abnormal pregnancy (S)
docs.snippet: BEIJING (AP) -- A Chinese court jailed three people on Friday who posted material on the Internet to help an illiterate woman pressure the authorities to reinvestigate her daughter's death, a defendant's lawyer said.

docs.lead_paragraph: One of the great tragedies of the developing world is the number of women who die in pregnancy and childbirth. But what is that number? Several studies had put it at somewhat more than 500,000 a year, while a new and apparently more rigorous study suggests that it has dropped to less than 350,000 a year.

headline.main: Good News from the Childbirth Front

docs.abstract: The fall in maternal deaths is good news -- and a sign of hope that it can be cut even more.
docs.snippet: The fall in maternal deaths is good news -- and a sign of hope that it can be cut even more.
